text: Yūki Meguro () is a Japanese actor. He is the son of jidaigeki actor Jūshirō Konoe and had an older brother Hiroki Matsukata. He was nominated for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Limited Series for his work in Shōgun in 1981's Emmy award. ==Film== *Lupin III: Strange Psychokinetic Strategy (film) (1974) *Legend of the Eight Samurai (1983) *Orochi, the Eight-Headed Dragon (1994) *Musashi (2019) ==Television== *Kunitori Monogatari (1973) as Maeda Toshiie *The Yagyu Conspiracy (1978) as Samon Tomonori Yagyū *Akō Rōshi (1979 TV series) (1979) as Uesugi Noritsuna *Shōgun (1980 miniseries) (1980) as Omi *Hissatsu Shigotonin Gekitotsu (1991) as Narikawa ==References== ==External links== * NHK 人物録 目黒祐樹 Category:1947 births Category:Japanese male film actors Category:Japanese male television actors Category:20th-century Japanese male actors Category:Japanese male stage actors Category:Living people
title: Yūki Meguro
